mapper.update: UPDATE devops_certification dc set dc.skip_check_project_permission = #{skipCheckPro} where dc.id = #{certId}
mapper.select: SELECT dc.id,dc.`name`,dc.domains FROM devops_certification dc WHERE dc.skip_check_project_permission IS true AND dc.organization_id = #{organizationId} UNION SELECT dc.id,dc.`name`,dc.domains FROM devops_certification dc JOIN devops_certification_pro_rel dcp ON dc.id = dcp.cert_id WHERE dcp.project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT cert.id, cert.name, cert.project_id, cert.object_version_number FROM devops_certification cert WHERE cert.project_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dc.*, dcf.key_file as key_value, dcf.cert_file as cert_value FROM devops_certification dc JOIN devops_certification_file dcf ON dc.certification_file_id = dcf.id WHERE dc.id = #{certId}
SELECT dc.*, cmd.error, cmd.command_type, cmd.status AS command_status FROM devops_certification dc LEFT JOIN devops_env_command cmd ON dc.command_id = cmd.id WHERE dc.id = #{certId}
SELECT dc.* FROM devops_certification dc WHERE dc.organization_id IS NOT NULL AND dc.project_id IS NULL
SELECT dc.* FROM devops_certification dc LEFT JOIN devops_env env ON env.id = dc.env_id WHERE env.cluster_id = #{clusterId}
